name: Exploding Arrow
flavor: Your ammunition explodes with magical energy.

metadata.flavor: Your ammunition explodes with magical energy.

effects.roll: Power Roll + Agility, Reason, Intuition, or Presence
effects.tier1: 5 + A, R, I, or P fire damage
effects.tier2: 7 + A, R, I, or P fire damage
effects.tier3: 10 + A, R, I, or P fire damage

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: One creature or object of your choice within 2 squares of the target takes fire damage equal to the characteristic score used for this ability's power roll.
